Hydras:

"The rust plague, my dear Maxima means our death... That plague rust 
our metallic bodies and consume our cicuits and cause us the 
death... and horible death by the way... that's you are running 
away, my dear,... you're running away of death..."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 3/10/03 1:23:24 AM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Here Hydras, what's going on my dear Maxima? "
> > 
> > 
> 
> Keeping in professional control, despite her 'wild organic 
emotions' wishing 
> to take over, >"Leaving the area of the Maximal Base."< Pasuing a 
moment. >
> "What is it that I am fleeing from? & why am I fleeing from it?"< 
Her voice 
> was not exactly very sweet, she didn't like fleeing from something 
unless 
> there was a very good explaination. & this better be one of them!
